quote_first: There must be a solution, there must be. Frantically I scan the cans of products stacked on the shelves. Stain Away. Vanish. There has to be a remedy. ... I just need to think. ...
quote_last: OK, I have the answer. It may not totally workâ€”but it's my best shot.
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella
